db2forzosdeveloperextension.title: IBM Db2 for z/OS Developer Extension
db2forzosdeveloperextension.description: Provides support for developing IBM Db2 for z/OS SQL applications.
db2forzosdeveloperextension.debug.config: Db2 Developer Extension Stored Procedure Debug
Creates a new configuration for debugging a user-selected spsql file.
Absolute path to an spsql file.
db2forzosdeveloperextension.db2sqlservic: Interval in seconds to send a dummy query to Db2 to keep connection alive.
Specify the port that the debugger session manager will use (for example: 4555, 4556, 4559-4985).  If you specify multiple ports, the first available port will be used.
Classpath for additional dependencies required by the Db2 SQL Service.
Specify the IP address that the Db2 SQL Service will use. If you are using this extension locally, do not specify this setting.
Specify the maximum heap size allocated to the Db2 SQL Service.
Specify the port that the Db2 SQL Service will listen on (for example: 3000, 3001, 3020-3025).  If you specify multiple ports, the first available port will be used.
Specify the action that is taken when an invalid character cannot be converted in SQL results sets.
Replace characters that cannot be converted with the ï¿½ character.
Issue an error message when a character cannot be converted.

Specify the maximum number of rows returned from result sets (either through Run All or Run Selected). The default value is -1, which returns all rows from a result set. Any other value less than 1 is ignored.
db2forzosdeveloperextension.debug.logLev: Select the detail level for the logs that are sent to VS Code. Detail levels are ordered from highest (trace) to lowest (off).
db2forzosdeveloperextension.java.home.de: Specify the path to the Java installation directory.
db2forzosdeveloperextension.maxNumberOfP: Specify the maximum number of syntax errors reported by the server.
db2forzosdeveloperextension.trace.server: Enable communication tracing between the VS Code client and the language server.
db2forzosdeveloperextension.exportOption: Specify the delimiter character to separate each column.
Specify one or more characters to use as the quote mark.
Specify one or more characters to use as the escaped quote mark.
Trim leading blanks from each field.
Trim trailing blanks from each field.
db2forzosdeveloperextension.commands.cat: Db2 Developer Extension: SQL Tuning Services
db2forzosdeveloperextension.commands.tun: Compare Access Path with Job ID
